name: nearby_arcgis
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nearby_places.
Tool description: Get nearby establishments.
API description: Returns nearby places sorted by distance from the origin coordinates in ascending order.

Only type values from **/v2/types (ArcGIS)** are valid.

Maximum returned places is 50.

radius.description: Search radius in meters. Defaults to 500. Maximum is 50,000.

type.description: Type of places to search for. Defaults to 'coffee shop'.
